nodes.text: The Xrexus Cartel was a criminal organization led by Boss-Mistress Xev Xrexus. The cartel began as a collection of semi-legitimate droid manufacturing firms that collectivized in order to fix prices and distribute unlicensed combat automata in the Outer Rim. Prior to the Invasion of Naboo, Xrexus captured the Jedi Padawan Eldra Kaitis and intended to sell her at an auction.
